data.name: Histera
data.detailed_description:
Master the Glitch
Keep your eyes open in Histera’s arena, the Glitch randomly re-generates zones of the map from the past, present and future as you fight. Battle through terrain from the steaming prehistoric jungles of the Pliocene Plateau, to the red brick ruins of war torn 20th century Novgorod, to gleaming skyscrapers of the futuristic metropolis of Montorro City.



Fight in Different Eras
As the Glitch pulls in different terrain from the past and future, era specific weapon pickups spawn in too. Get in close for a one hit kill with a throwing spear, skirmish at mid range with SMGs or a bow and arrow or keep your distance and gun down opponents with futuristic assault and sniper rifles.



Game Modes
Play together with your friends to defy the enemy! Try to kill as many people as possible from the opposite team in Team Deathmatch or steal the flag from your opponents in Capture the Flag. Would you rather play Territory Control? Maybe go wild in Free-for-all! Whether using a controller or keyboard you'll have to shoot straight, move fast and adapt to gain a positional advantage to get the win.

Feverish, Fast and FREE
With a diverse weapon pool to dive into and completely free to play, you'll have to shoot straight, move fast and adapt on the fly to gain a positional advantage and dominate your opponents. And with our Glitch mechanic reshaping the map as you fight, no two matches of Histera play out the same!

The game will be FREE-TO-PLAY. Wishlist now and be the first to jump in.



We're reaching for the stars with our unique Glitch mechanics and FREE-TO-PLAY multiplayer! Here's what's in store after Early Access:

  • MORE LEVELS
    You'll never see the end of The Glitch with a time distorting range of new eras and hand crafted map zones in the pipeline
  • MORE WEAPONS
    Hunt the enemy with ASTONISHING new weapons. Always keep the element of surprise in your favor.
  • MORE CHARACTERS
    Choose who you want to be out of a growing roster of remarkable new characters! Suit up in high-tech armor or travel light with tribal attire from prehistory!
  • MORE GAMEMODES
    Fancy yourself a Battle Royale player? Histera has its very own battle royale mode in the pipeline alongside many others!
  • ESPORTS FEATURES
    Feeling competitive? Do you see yourself making money just by playing the game you love? Histera's purpose built feature set could help make your esports dreams come true!
  • LEVEL EDITOR
    Create your own breathtaking levels and capture the communities' imagination in our level-editor!

Be the first to know when released. Wishlist NOW!

data.short_description: Histera is a FREE-TO-PLAY, rapid-fire multiplayer shooter featuring the 'Glitch' that randomly spawns in hand crafted map sections from the past, present and future during matches. Histera's arena is an unpredictable, time distorting mosh pit that delivers fast, ferocious and free FPS combat.
